Module com.example.schedulingdesktopapplication
Package com.example.schedulingdesktopapplication.controller

Class LoginScreenController

java.lang.Object
com.example.schedulingdesktopapplication.controller.LoginScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that views the login page in the application.
